column2: # check data to see if there are emojis

"It is frustrating, but does Alex understand how much more expensive #climatechange is going to be? There's no escape from #extremeweather, even if you live in Alberta. #pricecarbon https://t.co/iiJz8NAxQa"
"So pleased that @checkupcbc is discussing #carbontax as a #climatechange solution today. Tune in, you might get to hear me speak!"
"@checkupcbc So glad you're hosting this oh-so-important discussion, and appreciate the opportunity to share my POV as a climate-concerned mother. #PriceCarbon #climatechange #4rkids"
"Very good point - why is @JustinTrudeau's government still subsidizing #fossilfuel industry in the middle of a #climatechange crisis? https://t.co/mISg7tq0Rv"
"Experts Say Vast Deserts, Absence Of Life, May Indicate Mars Was Once Run By Conservatives https://t.co/IujrvprMc5 #LOL #SatireSpeaksTruth #climatechange"

"@checkupcbc James is right, but hasn't understood that #pricingcarbon is one of the best ways to use the market to address the #climatechange crisis. Cdns don't need in-depth understanding of tonne of carbon, need to know much more about #climatechange! https://t.co/bSPZTnpWWv"
